nodes.text: The Rot was a disease afflicting the poor people of Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. A cure for the Rot was developed and available at Tydis Neutronics, but most afflicted were unable to afford it until Kallig cured the infected to win their support.
The Rot appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
